attributes.action: Publics vote of no confidence in the current Labour Government
attributes.additional_details:
The country is in an absolutely awful state. This government has shown zero leadership and has gone back on every single promise made in the last general election. The country is increasing its debt, whilst rising its taxes on working people who contribute to this country and make it Great Britain! The solutions are obvious, but there is absolutely no will or desire to cut away the cancer that is draining money and resources from this country and making us poorer.

Enough is Enough.
attributes.background: Undertake a dissolution, so that a democratic general election can form.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
